title: Discipline Song Lyrics Yudham
stanzas: <div>Discipline Song Lyrics Yudham (Dangal)

oora paaraattura
engala vaattura
kedu pudi senju
enga uyira edukkura (2)
enga uyira edukkura

appaa overu workout-u
appaa overu workout-u
enga udambu thaangaadhu

appa overu workout-u
enga udambu thaangaadhu

chinna pasanga karuna
kaatunga kusthi aagaathu.(2)

DISCIPLINE  alavaa
DISCIPLINE  alavaa
irundha usuru pogaadhu

appaa overu work out-u
enga udambu thaangaadhu

torture pannuriye
yeppaa torture pannuriye
indha chinna pasangala
kedupudi senju
thinamum adakkuriye
yeppa torture pannuriye
nee romba torture pannuriye

seeni mittaai raatina bomma
paani poori parottaa
manasillaama nee sonnathaala
kaatunoame tataa

oadi aadum vayasulathaane
seyya venum galattaa
tension yaerudhu un
thollaiyaala sogam
pongudhu paattaa

thagaru dappaa vandiyile
ippa yaeriduthe luggage (2)

yeppa enga appaa
aattam poatta thappaa

appaa overu work out-u
enga udambu thaangaadhu

inippum pulippum
thinga vidaama
imisaiya kodukkiruye
yeppaa torture pannuriye
nee romba torture
pannuriye

ye azhagu poga
engala neeyum
vaatti edukkiriye
yeppaa torture pannuriye
nee romba torture
pannuriye

kurumbu seyyum
kozhandha paruvam
kaanja poovaa aache

piththu pidichu
nee suththurenu
oorukkulla pechu..

thoongunaalum
mulichirundhaalum
bayandhu kedappom dhiname

paadu pattum palan
illaiyenu vaadi pogudhu
maname.

manasukulla unnaala
oru aaraadha raname.(2)

appa unna vida
yeppaa aala vidudaa saami
yeppa unna vida
cinema villain
evvalavo maelu

appa overu work out-u
enga udambu thaangaadhu
